\maketitle
\begin{abstract}
We have observed the decay $K_L\rightarrow \mu^+\mu^- \gamma \gamma$
at the KTeV  experiment at Fermilab.     This decay presents a 
formidable background to the search for new physics in
$K_L\rightarrow\pi^0\mu^+\mu^-$.
The 1997 data yielded
a sample of 4 signal events, with an expected 
background of 0.155 $\pm$ 0.081 events. The 
branching ratio is
